puakma.addin.http.action
Class SharedActionClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      puakma.addin.http.action.SharedActionClassLoader
public class SharedActionClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

This class is used to load an action from the rdbms. An action is loaded, then all libraries are loaded into a cache. This seems to be a rather inefficient way of doing things, but can't think of a better way.

Method Detail

getActionClass

public java.lang.Class getActionClass(java.lang.String sDesignActionName)
                               throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Determine the actual classname to run based on the design element name. If it is not found it will try to load the data from the db.

Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

loadClassData

public void loadClassData(byte[] classData,
                          java.lang.String szClassName,
                          java.lang.String szDesignName)
Loads a class into the cache, assume the byte array is a valid class. This was made public so we can externally load classes in an ad hoc fashion.

getResourceAsStream

public java.io.InputStream getResourceAsStream(java.lang.String name)
Always delegate to the parent classloader

getResource

public java.net.URL getResource(java.lang.String name)
This method should not return anything useful for resources that come from the db.
